definition: Guangze county in Nanping 南平[Nan2 ping2] Fujian
pool/pond/(of metals etc) luster/favor or beneficence/damp/moist
Guangze county in Nanping 南平[Nan2 ping2] Fujian

sentences.english: Where Beauty cannot keep her lustrous eyes.
sentences.chinese: 美麗留不住她明眸的光澤。

sentences.english: Fine texture, uniform color-make-up to show you natural luster, and the makeup is not easily come off.
sentences.chinese: 質地細緻，上色均勻，不易脫妝，妝效呈現自然光澤。

sentences.english: Its shadows are an ambush, its lights a surprise .
sentences.chinese: 它的陰影象伏兵千萬，它的光澤令人驚異。

sentences.english: Restore luster to the skin, the beauty parlor every week or self-massage time.
sentences.chinese: 令肌膚恢復光澤，每週可以到美容院或自行按摩一次。

sentences.english: Most pearls have a soft silvery-white or cream shine.
sentences.chinese: 珍珠大都有柔和的銀白色或奶色光澤。

sentences.english: South Schisandra is singly small, flesh thin, looked withered, seeds there is no gloss rough.
sentences.chinese: 而南五味子粒小肉薄顯乾癟，種子粗糙無光澤。

sentences.english: This glimmering rose bronze facial glow gives your complexion a warm, delicate sheen.
sentences.chinese: 這熒玫瑰銅像面部輝光讓你的膚色溫暖，微妙的光澤。

sentences.english: In addition, they can be lacquered or mat.
sentences.chinese: 並且也可以製成光澤的或無光澤的。

sentences.english: In addition, they can be lacquered or mat.
sentences.chinese: 並且也可以製成光澤的或無光澤的。

sentences.english: The blue-white brilliants are the stones of the "finest water" .
sentences.chinese: 蘭白色的寶石是光澤度最好的鑽石。

sentences.english: A pair of iridescent pink scallops embrace each other like lovers.
sentences.chinese: 一對泛著粉彩光澤的扇貝，像情侶般相互擁抱著。

sentences.english: To study 20 years disease control effect of endemic cretinism in Guangze County.
sentences.chinese: 瞭解光澤縣地方性克汀病20年綜合防治的效果。

sentences.english: Adds silvery brightness to gray hair and neutralizes brassy tones in all shades.
sentences.chinese: 中和所有顏色秀髮的黃銅色，增加灰髮的光澤。

sentences.english: Or you can go for an eclectic look with a shiny metal or painted cart.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以別具一格，選擇帶金屬光澤或色彩鮮豔的。

sentences.english: Silk fabrics are shinier, more expensive.
sentences.chinese: 絲質布料比較有光澤，比較貴。
